content.question: While the loop is at rest in the position shown, the magnitude of the magnetic field is gradually increased by an amount <math alttext="delta B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>B</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> over a time <math alttext="delta t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. If an amount of charge <math alttext="Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> passes through point <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> while the field is changing, what is <math alttext="delta B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>B</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="Q R divided by A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>Q</mi><mi>R</mi><mo>/</mo><mi>A</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="Q R delta t, divided by A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>Q</mi><mi>R</mi><mtext> </mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mo>/</mo><mi>A</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="Q R, divided by A delta t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>Q</mi><mi>R</mi><mo>/</mo><mi>A</mi><mtext> </mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="Q R divided by A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>Q</mi><mi>R</mi><mo>/</mo><mi>A</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
